Your won hours will be displayed here. Click it for more information on your progress and life expectancy. Click on one of these categories to track your daily behavior and how it affects your life expectancy. This chart shows how many hours you have won in the last 5 days. Swipe right to access Settings, Privacy Policy, and more.

How much did you smoke? How much sport did you do today? How healthy have you eaten today? How much time did you spend outside? How was your general mood today?

 Disclaimer: 
 
 The data in this app that relates to your life expectancy is based solely on statistics so that only averages can be formed. Your actual life expectancy depends on many circumstances that can not be handled in this app. The statistics are based on scientific studies that cover the impact of the activities mentioned in the app on life expectancy. The studies used in this app are listed in the licenses. I assume no liability for the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the data. All claims for damages in connection with decisions and actions resulting from this app are also excluded. 

Will my app help you? If my app helps you in everyday life, please take a moment to rate it. It helps a lot to spread this app so other people can benefit as well. Thank you for your support! rating I like your app Remind me later No thanks

// App Intro aims statistics Improve your health Overcome obstacles future
The easiest way to reach your goals! By showing you how some behaviors have a dramatic impact on your life expectancy, they're more willing to make changes. Stay motivated by tracking your progress. Achieve your optimal shape by exercising more and eating healthier. This app helps you to overcome your biggest obstacles. Everything to help you become the best version of yourself. Live a longer, healthier and happier life.
